response.original_title: The Firm: Hips, Thighs and Abs
response.overview: The FIRM Hips, Thighs and Abs is designed to give you the shape you want with fast, simple and effective workouts! Performed on the floor or seated, this workout targets your hips, thighs and buttocks.  Plus a bonus abdominal workout for fabulous abs.
response.tagline: Fast, simple and effective--get the lower body you've always wanted! Plus, flab-free abs!
response.title: The Firm: Hips, Thighs and Abs
